data.name: Yago, the Coquerrestrial
data.detailed_description:
Story


When the Galactic Geographic magazine publisher calls you to his office you can't believe it.
Your mission? Film a new documentary about human habits, only one documentary of this kind was filmed in all our planetary history, and It's dated 40.000 years ago.
You were born to be an "extra-cocuelo" documentary maker, and this is your chance to prove him thay you are the best. However, everything will go from bad to worse...
Ludos Multimedia is pleased to announce his first Point & Click graphic adventure, "Yago, The Coquerrestrial", an adventure where nothing goes as you want.
data.about_the_game:
Story


When the Galactic Geographic magazine publisher calls you to his office you can't believe it.
Your mission? Film a new documentary about human habits, only one documentary of this kind was filmed in all our planetary history, and It's dated 40.000 years ago.
You were born to be an "extra-cocuelo" documentary maker, and this is your chance to prove him thay you are the best. However, everything will go from bad to worse...
Ludos Multimedia is pleased to announce his first Point & Click graphic adventure, "Yago, The Coquerrestrial", an adventure where nothing goes as you want.
data.short_description: Yago, the Coquerrestrial is a "Point & Click" third person adventure in which you play the character of a little alien from planet Coque.. You will interact with the diferent characters, items and elements that conforms the different stages using an easy radial menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Atom N450
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 945
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 942.5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition
  • Additional Notes: If you use more than one monitor at a time to avoid possible problems you will have to configure the game resolution to the standard. 1024x768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 942.5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition
  • Additional Notes: If you use more than one monitor at a time to avoid possible problems you will have to configure the game resolution to the standard. 1024x768

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10
  • Processor: Intel Atom N450
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 945
  • Storage: 905 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition
  • Additional Notes: For a correct operation it is necessary to have marked the option "to allow to execute file as a program" in the Files: Yago (main folder); Ags32 and Ags64 (Data folder). Also in Files-> Preferences-> behavior-> executable text files mark the "Run" option
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 905 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition
  • Additional Notes: For a correct operation it is necessary to have marked the option "to allow to execute file as a program" in the Files: Yago (main folder); Ags32 and Ags64 (Data folder). Also in Files-> Preferences-> behavior-> executable text files mark the "Run" option
